SettingsSample.Settings.Category.Descrip: Settings for the LoremIpsum sample generator.
SettingsSample.Settings.AutoUpdate.Descr: Whether to update the sample text when a setting changes.
SettingsSample.Settings.TextLength.Descr: Number of characters to include in the generated text.
SettingsSample.Settings.QuoteStyle.Descr: Style of quotes to enclose the generated text.
